mapper.insert: INSERT INTO annual_board (annual_id, annual_title, annual_start, annual_end, annual_content, annual_reg_date, annual_board_file) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(annual_id)+1, 1) FROM annual_board), #{annual_title}, #{annual_start}, #{annual_end}, #{annual_content}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO vacation_board (vacation_id, vacation_title, vacation_start, vacation_end, vacation_content, vacation_reg_date, vacation_board_file) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(vacation_id)+1, 1) FROM vacation_board), #{vacation_title}, #{vacation_start}, #{vacation_end}, #{vacation_content}, SYSDATE)
